Uggaha Sutta：Preached at Bhaddiya to the daughters of Uggaha Mendakanattā just before their marriage．

A wife should rise betimes before her husband，and sleep after him； she should respect his wishes， give him pleasure and be of sweet speech． His parents and elders and all those whom he holds in esteem，should she reverence and honour； she should be skilful in all the duties of the household； she should look after the servants in the house and supervise their duties，provide them with all necessaries and be kind and helpful to them； she should safeguard her husband’s interests and look after his wealth； she should be of virtuous conduct in every way．A．iii．36ff．
